com.thomsonreuters.upa.examples.provider

Class ItemHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.thomsonreuters.upa.examples.provider.ItemHandler

  • public class ItemHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the implementation of handling item requests for the interactive provider application.

    It provides methods for processing item requests from consumers and sending back the refresh/update messages. Methods for sending request reject/close status messages, initializing the item handler, checking if the item count per channel has been reached, checking if an item is already opened on a channel, checking if a stream is already in use, and closing item streams are also provided.

    This handler provides data for MarketPrice, MarketByPrice and MarketByOrder item requests.

      • processRequest

        public int processRequest(com.thomsonreuters.upa.transport.Channel chnl,
                          com.thomsonreuters.upa.codec.Msg msg,
                          com.thomsonreuters.upa.codec.DecodeIterator dIter,
                          com.thomsonreuters.upa.transport.Error error)
        Processes an item request. This consists of storing the request information, then calling sendItemResponse() to send the response.
        Parameters:
        chnl - - The channel of the response
        msg - - The partially decoded message
        dIter - - The decode iterator
        Returns:
        returns success if decoding of request message and sending of response message succeeds or failure if it fails.

      • sendCloseStatusMsgs

        public int sendCloseStatusMsgs(com.thomsonreuters.upa.transport.Channel channel,
                               com.thomsonreuters.upa.transport.Error error)
        Sends the item close status message(s) for a channel. This consists of finding all request information for this channel and sending the close status messages to the channel.
        Parameters:
        channel - - The channel to send close status message(s) to

      • sendItemUpdates

        public int sendItemUpdates(com.thomsonreuters.upa.transport.Channel channel,
                           com.thomsonreuters.upa.transport.Error error)
        Sends the item update(s) for a channel. This consists of finding all request information for this channel, and sending the responses to the channel.
        Parameters:
        channel - - The channel of the response
        error - - error information in case of failure.
        Returns:
        returns success if sending of item updates succeeds or failure if it fails.
